verses.verse: Then the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Moses, <WH4872> Now <WH6258> shall you see <WH7200> what <WH834> I will do <WH6213> to Pharaoh: <WH6547> for with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> shall he let them go, <WH7971> and with a strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027> shall he drive <WH1644> them out of his land. <WH776>
And God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> and said <WH559> to him, I am the LORD: <WH3068>

And I appeared <WH7200> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob, <WH3290> by the name of God <WH410> Almighty, <WH7706> but by my name <WH8034> JEHOVAH <WH3068> was I not known <WH3045> to them.

And I have also <WH1571> established <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with them, to give <WH5414> them the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> the land <WH776> of their pilgrimage, <WH4033> wherein <WH834> they were strangers. <WH1481>

And I have also <WH1571> heard <WH8085> the groaning <WH5009> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> whom <WH834> the Egyptians <WH4714> keep in bondage; <WH5647> and I have remembered <WH2142> my covenant. <WH1285>

Why <WH3651> say <WH559> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> I am the LORD, <WH3068> and I will bring <WH3318> you out from under <WH8478> the burdens <WH5450> of the Egyptians, <WH4714> and I will rid <WH5337> you out of their bondage, <WH5656> and I will redeem <WH1350> you with a stretched <WH5186> out arm, <WH2220> and with great <WH1419> judgments: <WH8201>

And I will take <WH3947> you to me for a people, <WH5971> and I will be to you a God: <WH430> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which brings <WH3318> you out from under <WH8478> the burdens <WH5450> of the Egyptians. <WH4714>

And I will bring <WH935> you in to the land, <WH776> concerning the which <WH834> I did swear <WH5375> to give <WH5414> it to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob; <WH3290> and I will give <WH5414> it you for an heritage: <WH4181> I am the LORD. <WH3068>

And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> so <WH3651> to the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> but they listened <WH8085> not to Moses <WH4872> for anguish <WH7115> of spirit, <WH7307> and for cruel <WH7185> bondage. <WH5656>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Go <WH935> in, speak <WH1696> to Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> that he let the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> go <WH7971> out of his land. <WH776>

And Moses <WH4872> spoke <WH1696> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> Behold, <WH2005> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> have not listened <WH8085> to me; how <WH349> then shall Pharaoh <WH6547> hear <WH8085> me, who <WH589> am of uncircumcised <WH6189> lips? <WH8193>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> and gave them a charge <WH6680> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and to Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> to bring <WH935> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

These <WH428> be the heads <WH7218> of their fathers' <WH1>houses: <WH1004> The sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> the firstborn <WH1060> of Israel; <WH3478> Hanoch, <WH2585> and Pallu, <WH6396> Hezron, <WH2696> and Carmi: <WH3756> these <WH428> be the families <WH4940> of Reuben. <WH7205>

And the sons <WH1121> of Simeon; <WH8095> Jemuel, <WH3223> and Jamin, <WH3226> and Ohad, <WH161> and Jachin, <WH3199> and Zohar, <WH6714> and Shaul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of a Canaanitish <WH3669> woman: these <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Simeon. <WH8095>

And these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> according to their generations; <WH8435> Gershon, <WH1647> and Kohath, <WH6955> and Merari: <WH4847> and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Levi <WH3878> were an hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>
The sons <WH1121> of Gershon; <WH1647> Libni, <WH3845> and Shimi, <WH8096> according to their families. <WH4940>

And the sons <WH1121> of Kohath; <WH6955> Amram, <WH6019> and Izhar, <WH3324> and Hebron, <WH2275> and Uzziel: <WH5816> and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Kohath <WH6955> were an hundred <WH3967> thirty <WH7970> and three <WH7969> years. <WH8141>
And the sons <WH1121> of Merari; <WH4847> Mahali <WH4249> and Mushi: <WH4187> these <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Levi <WH3878> according to their generations. <WH8435>

And Amram <WH6019> took <WH3947> him Jochebed <WH3115> his father's <WH1733> sister <WH1733> to wife; <WH802> and she bore <WH3205> him Aaron <WH175> and Moses: <WH4872> and the years <WH8141> of the life <WH2416> of Amram <WH6019> were an hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>
And the sons <WH1121> of Izhar; <WH3324> Korah, <WH7141> and Nepheg, <WH5298> and Zichri. <WH2147>
And the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel; <WH5816> Mishael, <WH4332> and Elzaphan, <WH469> and Zithri. <WH5644>

And Aaron <WH175> took <WH3947> him Elisheba, <WH472> daughter <WH1323> of Amminadab, <WH5992> sister <WH269> of Naashon, <WH5177> to wife; <WH802> and she bore <WH3205> him Nadab, <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> Eleazar, <WH499> and Ithamar. <WH385>
And the sons <WH1121> of Korah; <WH7141> Assir, <WH617> and Elkanah, <WH511> and Abiasaph: <WH23> these <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Korhites. <WH7145>

And Eleazar <WH499> Aaron's <WH175> son <WH1121> took <WH3947> him one of the daughters <WH1323> of Putiel <WH6317> to wife; <WH802> and she bore <WH3205> him Phinehas: <WH6372> these <WH428> are the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the Levites <WH3881> according to their families. <WH4940>

These <WH1931> are that Aaron <WH175> and Moses, <WH4872> to whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> Bring <WH3318> out the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> according <WH5921> to their armies. <WH6635>

These <WH1931> are they which spoke <WH1696> to Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> to bring <WH3318> out the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from Egypt: <WH4714> these <WH1992> are that Moses <WH4872> and Aaron. <WH175>
And it came <WH1961> to pass on the day <WH3117> when the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714>

That the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559> I am the LORD: <WH3068> speak <WH1696> you to Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> all <WH3605> that I say <WH1696> to you.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> Behold, <WH2005> I am of uncircumcised <WH6189> lips, <WH8193> and how <WH349> shall Pharaoh <WH6547> listen <WH8085> to me?
